Reviews.Content: After spending new years eve 2010 in daytona beach at the Main Street block party, my husband and I looked forward to ringing in 2012 the same way. We booked the Plaza Club on Skoosh for a great rate and were excited to spend a night on Daytona Beach. We first attemted to checkin on New Years Eve at 4pm. Upon entering the lobby, the line was backed up to the hotel restaurant. Not wanting to waste prescious sun on the beach, we left for a while. We arrrived at 5:20 to find the line had grown. There were two very nice girls working the front desk, but the crowd just continued to grow. At 6:30, we finally got to the counter for check in. Never once in that hour of standing there did we see the manager! He should have been out in the lobby apologizing for the delay or assisting the ladies working the desk! After getting our room keys we had to wait again for a luggage cart and then park the car a block away behind a gas station at the hotels "overflow" parking lot. Not wanting the check in process to ruin the entire night, we headed up to the room and changed fo dinner at the Ocean walk, just a few blocks away. We spent a couple hours in the room before heading to main street for the fireworks. THe view from the balcony was beautiful and the bedding was clean. THe microwave had seen better days, but aside from that I was happy with the price I had paid. I would not have been happy had I paid the NYE price the motel was offering. Aside from the motel being ill prepared for the check in's on NYE, the place was just another average beachfront motel in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, but 30 minute checkin process a pain.”
Reviews.Author: TomInFL48
Reviews.Content: The good: Hotel was clean and well appointed. It is close to many activities, within walking distance. The hotel layout was good, with rooms and restaurant/bar/pool areas easy to find and maneuver. Employees were very polite. The bad: Check-in took 30 minutes! The line was out the door for hours on New Years Eve. Parking fee of 5% was slipped in, never mentioned on booking. Maids were very noisy in am. Glass door lock did not work. Employees were confused about specials (New Years).

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Daytona!”
Reviews.Author: MissezM
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for an excellent hotel on Daytona Beach, look no further than Plaza Ocean Club. We visit regularly, but stayed this past NYE weekend. Although the hotel was very crowded, the staff remained friendly and accommodating. The hotel offers beautiful ocean views, clean rooms, and a beautiful pool area with tiki bar. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “An Amazing Time!!”
Reviews.Author: martinave418
Reviews.Content: Some friends and I stayed here for New Years Eve and had an awesome time. The staff was very helpful and accommodating. The deal that we got was very reasonable and the rooms were great!! Ocean view rooms!!! It was in walking distance to everything!!We are already planning on making this a yearly trip!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience !”
Reviews.Author: Denis M
Reviews.Content: We were so very well and warmly greeted ! Decided to stay 2 nights ! Soooo comfy and super clean room! Breakfast was amasing ! We certainly want to go back next year !!!!!!!!!!! One of the best places in Daytona !

Reviews.Title: “Hotel stay review.”
Reviews.Author: Tammy D
Reviews.Content: We stayed in an ocean view room. It was beautiful. The staff were very nice and our overall experience was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Great Getaway Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Lovetotravel21978
Reviews.Content: Husband and I did a short getaway before heading into the typical New England Winter late October. Hotel is very clean and right on the beach, this time of year not very busy in Daytona. Room had Ocean view from our balcony and enjoyed having the microwave and frig in our room. Hotel is a short walk from the broad walk area, lots of restrauants, shops, and clubs near by. Bed was comfortable, and room was kept very clean! Only small complaint is that they make you pay to park your car at their hotel, as a guest I don't feel you should have to pay for parking! Hotel restrauant never seemed to be open. Over all I would return and stay again! Staff very friendly!

Reviews.Title: “GREAT TIME IN DAYTONA BEACH”
Reviews.Author: shari p
Reviews.Content: Had a great time in Daytona Beach. i stayed at the Oceans Beach Plaza Hotel. The room was clean with frig and coffee pot. It had a balcony with a great view of the beach. I will stay here again. Shari from Kentucky

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant surprise!”
Reviews.Author: Leonardo S
Reviews.Content: We had a very comfortable quiet room on the 4th floor with balcony and view of beach, huge pool with waterfall. Walked that evening to souvenir stores across street and to a very nice family Oyster Pub the friendly bartender recommended and even gave us coupons for! Great staff and very good complimentary breakfast! Also used Florida Travel Book and used coupon to get even better price on this room! Overall it was a great value and located on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Its what your looking for”
Reviews.Author: Simon G
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice hotel with the service and staff of a high class hotel. It was a great enviorment to be around and great fun for the kids. There is tons to do at night after a long day at the beach. Overall i thought it was a great place and deffinitaly coming back.

Reviews.Title: “great value for money”
Reviews.Author: julie b
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel as a one night stop while driving up the east coast. From the price we paid we didn't expect too much but were pleasantly surprised. We had a large room on 10th floor looking over the ocean, Walt the bartender was a great source of information and a really nice guy. We didn't even realise breakfast was included which was a bonus. The building could do with a freshen up, but then the prices would go up!

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: Sandra B
Reviews.Content: Great value, we stayed only one night but it was in the perfect location. Service was great. Walking distance to everthing. I would and will stay there again. A gem in Daytona and on the beach!

Reviews.Title: “Extended Stay”
Reviews.Author: Chris M
Reviews.Content: Came for two nights and stayed 7, great location and staff. Exterior and main areas in great condition, rooms were roomy but ready for new carpet. Water pressure was to die for!!! Allowed my dog with no promblem with plenty of area to walk him. Very close to alot of activities and most in walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “nice view”
Reviews.Author: CA126
Reviews.Content: The rates were reasonable with good hospitality. Hotel was a little on the old side but nice. Balcony was small.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Brian N
Reviews.Content: I recommend an ocean front rooms. It was an awesome stay!!! Huge beach front room, kitchenette, and a breath taking view!!!! The room was fresh and clean! The linens were soft and comfy.The staff like I said is all about the guest and that is refreshing to find anymore! We booked wanting to be close to Main Street for easy walking distance, and it was.

Reviews.Title: “Unbeatable ocean front view”
Reviews.Author: smokies2
Reviews.Content: I recomend an ocean FRONT room. We had a king bed, wrap around balcony seperate small room for the Microwave/fridge area. Our room apeared to be clean enough but did have a damp musty odor probably due to the ocean air. The place could use a good scrubbing and new paint but the view and location to downtown make up for all of that. Be prepared to hear all of your neighbors,.the walls are thin but We would definately go back

Reviews.Title: “Biketoberfest 2011”
Reviews.Author: Valarie G
Reviews.Content: We booked wanting to be close to Main Street for easy walking distance..Room was ok but for the price I was expecting nicer rooms. The tile in the shower was painted over, had to pay for parking which when I booked was told it was free, safe did not work but was charged for it anyway and they required a $25 deposit for incidentials in case you wanted to charge something to your room. Had to go to lobby for extra towels since they did not replace any towels the 2 days we were there. Also, when I called to book they charged one night right away to credit card then called 2 weeks before event saying they required us to pay for second night before we stayed, claiming corporate required it. Needless to say, I refused to pay for second night until check in. Don't know if I would book another Bikefest with them again.

Reviews.Title: “Biketoberfest 2011”
Reviews.Author: Justin B
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel wanting somthing more than average for our trip from the UK to Biketoberfest. (average meaning Days Inn, Travelodge etc). but were greeted with less than the web site photo's and descriptions promised. We booked an Ocean view room which during the bike event was $189 per night. The Hotel is pretty tired, especially the rooms, they are JUST like Days Inn rooms, the room was not made up on the first night of the stay, the soap etc were not replaced during the 4 night stay. The bed linens feel pretty scratchy and we were bitten quite a bit, can't say for sure but it seemed to be overnight so i blame the beds! In my opinion this hotel has been worn out by spring breakers and the Hotel Owners are fine with that due to the money it brings in. The staff and bar staff were nice enough. PS if you want to cancel a night during events you will be charged (unlike most US hotels)

Reviews.Title: “Not that great..”
Reviews.Author: NicP14
Reviews.Content: We came to daytona just to get away from the chilly north. We checked in late and the front desk staff was very nice. We got up to the room and the hallway looked like it hadnt been kept up well, doors had chipped paint and had a funny odor. The room was very spacious and a large area for the bathroom so that we could all get ready. Which is very important when your traveling with four other girls. We are very concious about bed bugs so we checked the beds which they were clean but the mattress pad/cover had a large yellow stain that looked like pee. We called the desk and they sent up a whole new set of sheets right away. We had a nice view of the ocean and it had a balcony which was nice. However the only concern was that there was no door or curtain on the closet so all of our things were just out in the open. Our weekend weather was bad, very very windy and rainy all weekend so although the beach was right there we could not go in the ocean. Our last night there the winds were so bad that it was hard to walk to the car and the doors swung open or slammed getting in and out, and our parking pass had flown out when we returned around 1030pm. We asked the desk if we would be okay without one and she said no and made us a new one. However none of us wanted to venture back outside because it was raining and the winds were absolutely rediculous so we asked if we could skip putting it in since we were leaving in the morning anyways and the woman said no we absolutely had to put it in. I found it absurd that they would force someone to go outside in weather like that just to put a hangtag in for one night. Although the restaurant does not serve dinner there are plenty of places close by the eat.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for the money”
Reviews.Author: Gretchen I
Reviews.Content: We went to Daytona in October just to get away. This hotel has easy access to the beach and wasn't a bad deal. The hotel and beach were quiet at this time of year. Good bartender. Nice staff. Everyone was very pleasant and accomidating. If I go back I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Short stay review.”
Reviews.Author: baga8
Reviews.Content: We used this hotel because it accepted our bid through priceline. We got there past midnight and service was not as merry as we would have liked. The rooms were nice and big and had everything we needed to rest. The downsides were that the carpet could have been cleaner and the tub was clogged (it filled up as you were taking a shower). We checked out at 8am. We did not see the rest of the hotel. The ladies at check out were really nice.

Reviews.Title: “Nice to stay on the beach”
Reviews.Author: athertonstan
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel nice location right on the beach with a pool weekend breakfast very nice. roon a good size with a Ocean view, Places to eat near by.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value and Location”
Reviews.Author: Jill E
Reviews.Content: Stayed overnight before going on cruise out of Port Canaveral. Location excellent on beach and in walking distance to pier. Very clean and staff very friendly and helpful. Breakfast in the restaurant was very good. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay and have fun!”
Reviews.Author: Pam J
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this hotel to everyone. I had a great stay. Very comfortable and wonderful views from our room. The staff were all A+++++++++++++++++.It is in a very convenient location to everything.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for the Price”
Reviews.Author: Kathleen S
Reviews.Content: We stayed in September and received a very good rate for a 3-night stay. The location was good as it was within easy walking distance to the pier. The staff was very friendly and the pool area was kept very clean. There is a nice bar adjacent to the pool. I would stay there again without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “LOCATION IS GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: KIMCHIZ
Reviews.Content: Booked on Priceline and have stayed here 3 times. The pool is nice and the Location is great. The elevator is horid and the rooms are outdated but clean.

Reviews.Title: “Fisrt Gymnast Competition”
Reviews.Author: LunaBZ
Reviews.Content: The quality service was really good, the only thing is the hotel is really old, it is very clean but really old, needs improvement.

Reviews.Title: “My favorite was the pool area”
Reviews.Author: Jessica A
Reviews.Content: Loved the beautiful pool area, with very easy access to the beach. We had a wonderful time here, everything was clean and it was very affordable. I would definitely recomend using ths Hotel. Also I loved that the Hotel has its own bar, Atlantic Jacks. Wonderful service and friendly emplyees.

Reviews.Title: “great”
Reviews.Author: robertr1957
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a week from 10th of sept 2011 me and my husband, Got a great room with sea veiw .The staff were great couldnt help you enough.Great for beach we walked along it every day to the peir.Fantastic bar the staff were so freindly and the cocktails were good.Plenty of resturants and things to do all near by.Will be back for sure as we are going back next year. Got to know some nice people as the red hatters were there for there yearly get together it was nice to see them all dressed and enjoying themselfs

Reviews.Title: “Honeymoon at the Plaza Ocean Club Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Akeem11
Reviews.Content: My Husband and I went to a near by traveler agent in the area in which we live and she gave us a magazine with all the Top Hotels in Daytona Beach, FL for our honeymoon. We selected the Plaza Ocean Club Hotel due to the overall nightly rate, the location, and the overall access to other places to visit near the hotel such as Marineland and Ponce Intel Lighthouse. We had a great experience which included great service and I would recommend this hotel to others that are planning a vacation to Daytona Beach, FL.

Reviews.Title: “great price for a great hotel”
Reviews.Author: scotyw
Reviews.Content: i had a fantastic time at this hotel, the room was very clean and comfortable, the pool was nice and the staff was very friendly and helpful, i will definately be going back here, this hotel is close to all the are attractions and is a great deal when comparing area hotels that dont even come close to what this hotel offers.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Experience”
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M
Reviews.Content: Staying at the Plaza Ocean Club in Daytona Beach was a wonderful experience. All the employees were so friendly and helpful and made us feel our enjoyable experience was very important to them. We stayed in one of their beach-front suites (thank you Mo) which we were able to reserve at an exceptional price just hours before our arrival. Their restaurant is very nice and the free breakfast was wonderful. The bar is very quaint and friendly. Beach front access was of utmost importance to us and we got it. Although the hotel itself could use some updating and painting in some areas (the main one the balcony) it was nothing obvious and did not affect our stay. Highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “needs updating and renovations”
Reviews.Author: RAR988
Reviews.Content: There was a group of us and everyone felt differently but overall everyone was unsatisfied with this hotel and wouldn't stay here again. Never heard of having to pay for parking when you stay at the hotel and then you go to dinner and come back and can't find a spot to park. They charge you for incidentals that you don't use and ask for deposit when room is already paid for and charged on your credit card. The water accumulated in bottom of tub while you showered and went down slowly. tried to call front desk and room service and it just rang and rang no one answered. The elevators were very slow had to use the stairs glad we were on 2nd floor. had to go up to 3rd floor for ice, not on every floor. We upgraded for a cost for Ocean view and when you went out on balcony had noisy air conditioning unit and rooftop to look at. If it hadn't of been for the event we were there for to make it convenient to attend we would have stayed elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Older hotel but very clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: just1cyndi
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent one night at the Plaza Ocean Club Hotel, Daytona Beach. We had a nice double-queen room on the 10th floor of this 11-story hotel. We had a nice balcony with a view of the ocean. The room was clean, the staff was nice, and the next day we watched football in Atlantic Jack's on property. Scott the Bartender was awesome! The hotel's two ancient elevators are exceptionally slow.

Reviews.Title: “excellency”
Reviews.Author: edgar b
Reviews.Content: I had a very nice stay, the view of the beach is extraordinary.Eveything looked very nice and the service was wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “Working Vacation”
Reviews.Author: BusinessTraveler529
Reviews.Content: Great location I loved it, can't get closer to the beach. It was worth the business trip, just for the atmosphere.

Reviews.Title: “My Dog and I Give it TWO paws up! Our Favorite Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: megantracy
Reviews.Content: This was the 4th time my little Yorkie and I stayed here. Very DOG FRIENDLY! The room was fresh and clean. Great ocean view from the top floor. Clean pool and grounds, Very friendly staff. Yes its true the elevator was a little slow but despite the line at the desk and the continued ringing of the phone the desk clerk got us checked in fast! Great location! Many great places to eat and drink within walking distance. I'll be booking again real soon! I wouldn't stay anywhere else!

Reviews.Title: “"Loved IT"”
Reviews.Author: pclc69
Reviews.Content: This hotel was nice, just as the pictures depicted. We had an oceanview room with kitchenette, very useful andthe view was great. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The downstairs oceanfront bar/resteraunt was nice kinda pricey though, and didn't stay open very late. The outdoor pool was beautiful, not many people in it at night. Would highly reccomend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Comfortable Stay”
Reviews.Author: RockmanGalway
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 2 days in room 1001 - and oceanfront spacious room with kitchenette and a great balcony. This is and older establishment and is pretty well maintained - it is not 5 star and we did not pay a 5 star price. The hotel was very busy but check in was quick and receptionist very polite and helpful. From previous reviews, I dreaded the elevator but found it not to be as slow as some folks indicated - maybe we were lucky! Facilities such as pool deck and beach were clean and spacious. The kitchenette is very basic and no utensils were provided - it contained a microwave, small fridge, coffee maker and sink - that's it. We had breakfast in the restaurant - it was a little disappointing - a guest was arguing with a waitress when we walked in. Evidently - for the buffet breakfast, you can have one drink - either juice or coffee - this is really petty - please fix this. Food was OK only and service while polite - was painfully slow. Free WiFi is provided and it worked well. In summary, for the price we paid, we really enjoyed ourselves, felt we got great value and we will return again.

Reviews.Title: “For the money . . .”
Reviews.Author: cristine d
Reviews.Content: For the money we spent, I thought the accommodations were adequate. I was very displeased with the elevator, VERY slow and only two to service the entire hotel. The hallways smelled of urine and the rooms are in dire of updating/remodeling. But, again for the amount we spent we knew it was not a five star. Staff , except for the resturant folks, were awesome and extremely helpful. We arrived on a Saturday evening, which at first had a bit nervous because there was a lot of partying going on. However, after our first night, things settle down and we enjoyed the immeidate access to the beach and local shops. Not sure I would choose this again, but for the money and access to the beach, it met our needs.

Reviews.Title: “A working vacation”
Reviews.Author: Bruce B
Reviews.Content: When my Association booked our annual Convention in Daytona Beach I was excited about attending this year. And being located right on the beach just sealed the deal. A great time was had by all.

Reviews.Title: “better than excellent did not want to leave”
Reviews.Author: dabruggeman
Reviews.Content: Ashley at the front desk made our stay very wonderfull from the day we walked in til the time we left, Ashley was always there smiling and helping out. the room was very comfortable and clean beachfront with kitchenette. our dog was even welcomed by everyone. we can not wait until our next visit we will definately be staying here again and again Also the bar specials and the pool was very nice everyone there made our vacation feel as if they were catering to us we have only been home for a few days and already want to go back. Thanks again Ashley and crew for all your smily faces.

Reviews.Title: “we like it and will come back.”
Reviews.Author: devon j
Reviews.Content: The hotel was easy to find, we had great room that face the ocean, but found out all the room face the ocean, we where room 403 and was able to see the fire works, or yeah the real reason was the beach, it was easy to walk from the hotel to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “It was nice but couldhave been better.”
Reviews.Author: SniderINK
Reviews.Content: Upon check in we were given a room without a kitchenette but that was no big problem. The staff at the front desk were quick to fix the problem. However my idea of a kitchenette and theirs are two different things. Other than a microwave there was no way to cook anything and there was no kitchen table. Which meant we were going to have to spend more than expected on eating out. Although the view was beautiful, the rooms were clean and they were tended to daily. The worst thing about this hotel was the elavator wait times. And don't plan on taking the stairs, they smell like pee. If you weren't in the rooms the rest of the hotel felt muggy. The main area and the restaurant were okay though. The pool was a little over crowded but it was to be expected. Oh and the main lobby during busy pool hours was wet due to all the traffic. The hotel was close to everything which made it an ideal pick, I do think next time I will spend the extra $60-$70 and stay and the Plaza Resort and Spa next door. Atleast they had 3 elavators.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful views of the Ocean”
Reviews.Author: John P
Reviews.Content: Loved the ocean views and all the staff including housekeeping was super friendly. The hotel does need some updating however the rooms were very clean. Have lots of free time when you get there or want to go somewhere....the elevators in the hotel sucked....on Saturday and Sunday the average wait time was 5-10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “This was a free 3day 2 night stay which was a prize won.”
Reviews.Author: Lucy P
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice vacation, People working there were very friendly and helpful. The room could have been cleaner.

Reviews.Title: “Fix the ghost infested elevator!”
Reviews.Author: jjmak999
Reviews.Content: Had a great time with ashley's service she is a jewel! The elevator stops at phantom floors and bein at the top we put up with incredible delays..ppl laffed with us hey if u want a working elevator pay another 60 bux at the lux plaza nxt door..seriously we were there for the last shuttle launch and i'd go back just not stay on such a high floor!

Reviews.Title: “Problems are out of local control”
Reviews.Author: Tom A
Reviews.Content: While I stayed in room 1115 on 8/6/2011 I experienced a very capable and caring staff trying to keep an old hotel viable. The first noticeable problem was parking. While it is a problem I'm not sure how the management of the hotel can fix it without buying property. Next problem was the elevators. Some much needed replacements of both elevators would help. All of the other reviews talking about elevators are correct. My family of 5 walked from the 11th floor to the lobby faster than the elevator. But again there is nothing the local staff of the hotel could do about this. We elected to do lunch at the restaurant (Atlantic Jack’s) attached to the hotel for lunch but at 2:00pm it had closed for the afternoon. The bar served us and while it was served in take-out containers, it was quite good. Access to the beach was excellent and the pool was adequate. WIFI was available but on the 11th floor none of our 4 iPhones or iPad2 would connect. A call to the tech support number provided by the hotel to the 3rd party vendor providing service resulted in the tech saying apple product always have trouble connecting to anything. Upon returning from a day at the beach a guest at the hotel informed us that the hotel had no water but they were working on it. With that we went out to eat and upon return water service had been restored. Our overall stay was an experience but mostly not under the control of the local personnel. They did also promise a $10.00 refund for posting a review on Tripadvisor

Reviews.Title: “We had a great time!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: AKelley79
Reviews.Content: The customer service was excellent at the hotel. When we first went to check in we didnt have reservations we just walked in and asked for prices money was tight so the lady at the counter helped us by giving us a number to call to book through a reservation line so we could get a cheaper price we ended up getting a great deal on the room rates so we could stay for 2 nights PLUS a free $25 food and beverage card which paid for our breakfast in the morning. We saved so much money that my son got to do more things than we had planned which made our first family vacation together one that we will always remember!!! This will be the only hotel we stay at when visiting daytona beach!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Old, bitter and needs to retire!!”
Reviews.Author: joyja
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights in July. We were there for a time-share presentation/scam and this is where they had reserved our rooms. This hotel might have been a beautiful hotel once back in 1973 but now she is just old, bitter and needs to retire. The rooms were spacious and had a great view but it ends there. One of our two beds were sagging to one side, the bath tub faucet was leaking (I'm talking about a few drips, it was leaking a steady stream of water), the fridge was smelly and rusty on the bottom, I can see through to the outside wall where the airconditon was. It looks like the seal or seam of the unit was installed and it deterioted, exposing the outside. I was paranoird that some creepy crawlies would come through those holes the whole time I was there. The carpet was thread bare, there were cracks in all of the walls, and it looks like someone crashed something into a corner of the wall and took out a chunk of plasters and then it was left like that. The elevator was extremely slow so I ended up taking the stairs. Never again, as the stairwell smell like stale urine and vomit!!!! They also charge you $5 a night for parking but if you come back to the hotel after 8, it was full every time. We had to circle for 30 mins or risk parking on the street. The beach was very nice so we stayed mostly there just to avoid having to come back to our depressing room. Upon check out, the front desk clerk asked for us to go and leave them a positive comment on Tripadvisor and they will credit our credit card $5. Talk about trying to buy your way into a good review!!! Over all - if I were 18, only want to party and stay drunk in Daytona during spring break, this would be the ideal place. Otherwise, give this hotel a passed.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: Suehupp
Reviews.Content: Loved the Plaza, Rooms are great, nice views.Ashley at front desk a plus for the place. Breakfest was great, pool clean and everything in good order. I stayed at many places thru the years and this was the best by far.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful View!”
Reviews.Author: familytyme1
Reviews.Content: The pictures you find online do not give this place justice. Every room faces the ocean and the Ocean Walk is literally right down the street. I had a fantastic time and now have memories to cherish for a lifetime.

Reviews.Title: “Good Time , will return”
Reviews.Author: Mimi29829
Reviews.Content: We had a nice time. Staff very friendly. Room clean and comfortable. Only issue was stairway. Needed to be cleaned with some bleach. Unpleasant smell. Overall, very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful place to stay and we will be back!”
Reviews.Author: katelyn1003
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time at this hotel. What a great location for us to be able to walk to the Main Street Pier and all the shops. All the staff at this hotel were wonderful. They were very friendly, knowlegeable, patient and polite. They had a barbecue poolside on Saturday with a DJ, which was a lot of fun. They have a little bar that was a lot of fun. The one bartender, Walt, was a great bartender. He is very polite and definitely treats his customers very, very nice. He seems intelligent and can talk to other customers about their culture, which I was impressed about. We were informed they were having a dive-in-movie at their sister hotel and if we wanted, we could go to see the movie and we also, had the chance to see the fireworks on the Pier which were on Saturday night. I would recommend this place to everyone, as it was very enjoyable, fun and relaxing. Thank you for a great time!

Reviews.Title: “2nd time there and can't wait to go back next year!!”
Reviews.Author: bzytam
Reviews.Content: The only reason I can't give a 5 star is the elevators. They are pretty slow but the staff more than make up for this. They are all so friendly and willing to help. Love our time there!!

Reviews.Title: “The Plaza Ocean Club Hotel was a refreshing change from where we stayed in Daytona a couple of months ago.”
Reviews.Author: SusieQ97
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean and the staff was very helpful and friendly. The pool was wonderfully clean and spacious. The DJ was delightful and we thoroughly enjoyed our visit. The hotel was close enought to the Pier that we caught the fireworks on Saturday night, what a sight over the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome staff and good location”
Reviews.Author: wlt_11
Reviews.Content: When we first arrived there was a slight mix up with our reservations. We were supposed to have 2 connecting rooms on the lowest floor possible. They had us scheduled to be on the 6th floor. The staff immediately worked to correct the problem. They were able to give us rooms on the 3rd floor only a room apart and they upgraded one room to a full kitchenette at no charge. The rooms were very spacious with a nice layout. They could use some updating though (tv, carpet, etc.) Location was great! Not so far that you couldn't walk to boardwalk/restaurants, etc. but not so close that you heard all the noise from there. You can enter the beach right from the pool area at the back of the hotel. There is a gas station/convenience store right across the street that carries a little bit of everything you might need while there. The restaurant had a very tasty breakfast buffet with a good variety of thing to choose from. What I liked best about this hotel was the staff. Everyone was so nice and helpful. Even when I was a little upset about the mixup when we first arrived the staff was always friendly and pleasant. From the front desk to the restaurant/bar area to housekeeping and maintenance everyone had a smile and greeting when you saw them. Also the girl at the front desk gave us some great tips on places to have food delivered - she was right on with her suggestions! What I liked least about this hotel is the elevators. There are only 2 small ones and they are sooo slow. We took the stairs only a few times because they smelled really bad. Also there is limited parking (which you pay for daily) directly surrounding the hotel although you can park in the adjacent hotels on both sides if necessary.

Reviews.Title: “Highly Mediocre”
Reviews.Author: ggg341
Reviews.Content: This is a really funny place to judge because it can drive you nuts but its location is amazing. I think overall I would give it like a C+ mainly due to its great location and price. It all depends on the price you pay and when you go. During slower times you can get some really low rates here through the travel websites then it's definitely worth it. Very quickly to explain my points.... the good is: reasonably clean, location I liked because there is more action and people near here (4 minute walk to Ocean Walk maybe two football fields) and to me that's safety, it gets darker and eerier the further away you get from the action due to the no lights for turtles. Daytona Beach Shores at night seems too dark for me. The not so good which can be very annoying: the pool seems to get alot of people who are not staying at the hotel but they dont care, the restaurant is not so good and I'm being kind and going to the front desk is like going to the twilight zone as you can sometimes wait 30 minutes on line to ask for a towel as they are 100% clueless. We want to go to the beach and the desk girl is chatting away about her personal life and there are 15 people on line! Service overall very poor but if you dont need them often you may be ok. And lastly you will wait and wait for elevators here. In summary I would stay here again if under $70 but not a penny more.

Reviews.Title: “It was just like the pictures on the Internet”
Reviews.Author: jene38
Reviews.Content: The staff was very friendly, rooms were nice ,bathrooms were ok, the pool area was nice, access to the beach was great, not enough light on the parking lot, lobby was just like the pictures on enternet, it was pet friendly didnt like that part. but for an overall stay it was ok .

Reviews.Title: “Nice place for an enjoyable weekend”
Reviews.Author: cthomas102060
Reviews.Content: We arrived late Friday and checked in. Jennifer the desk associate was very nice and we checked in immediately. On the way up to the room we noticed this motel was getting old but it was very clean. Our room was very clean . We ate breakfast at the resturaunt down stairs the next morning and they offered a hot breakfast buffet for $8.95 and a continental or cold breakfast for $6.95. Alot of money for a so so breakfast. On the weekends they have a DJ at the pool that played music for all ages and I mean all ages with games for the kids as well as the adults. All in all a wonderful weekend and we would not hesitate to return again. We really enjoyed our stay!

Reviews.Title: “We were really please and my family had a "Blast!"”
Reviews.Author: MiaRidley
Reviews.Content: The staff at the hotel were very friendly and made everyone feel at home. The rooms were comfortable and clean. While at the hotel, we were able to use the hospitality room for a family gathering which was very convenient and entertaining. The pool was heated and the kids really enjoyed the easy access to the beach. We will definitely be planning another trip back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Not very good!!”
Reviews.Author: Mimiblank
Reviews.Content: We have visited Daytona Beach many times over the years. I have never encountered the things we did here. Five dollars to park, only no place in the on site lot. We had to cross A1A and park a block away. A fee of $1.50 a day for the safe in our room that did not work. No coolers by the pool and no drinking your own beer by the pool. The elevators were awful. I normally don't complain, but I did this time. I spoke to Ashley at the front desk, and she bordered on being rude and I got no satisfaction from her. Great location, but too many problems.

Reviews.Title: “If you're checking tripadvisor, this place is below your standards”
Reviews.Author: swskat
Reviews.Content: Really all a hotel has to be is clean. For this place I can look past the very rude front desk, the ridiculous $5 a day parking fee, slow elevators, and even the poorly done patch work but it was not clean! Bathroom looked it had not been cleaned for a long while. The floor and shower was dirty and had hair everywhere. The shower curtains were covered in mold and there was all kinds of hairs covering the sheet at the head of one of our beds. I didn't dare walk on the floor without shoes. The lobby was nice enough and the location was great but not worth staying here. NOT a 3 star hotel by any standards.

Reviews.Title: “well rounded”
Reviews.Author: pana49
Reviews.Content: I and my family found everthing we needed for our family.. we will stay again . nice for families and friends.............very polite staff .......we where a little early and they accomodated us ..........just great!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good rooms, bad common areas, bad service”
Reviews.Author: valtravelpal
Reviews.Content: Checking in was a nightmare....only 2 people working behind the desk and I have no idea what took so long to get people checked in. The common areas of the hotels (lobby, elevators, pool) are kind of run down. The elevators were disgusting, they smelled so bad. And everything in the common areas smelled like mildew, and I understand its hard to keep that under control with being right on the beach. We had terrible service at the restaurant. We had free breakfast but passed on it because it wasn't that great. The bar had great service though. Pretty much the only good service in the whole place. The room was nice, comfy bed, fridge, and patio. Again the service was lacking, the maid wasn't that great. Bottom line, fine rooms, bad common areas, really bad service with exception of the bar.

Reviews.Title: “Good Stay with some annoyances”
Reviews.Author: upstatemom999
Reviews.Content: Stayed 7/4-7/6/11 with my husband and 3 kids (13, 10, 2) Overall had a decent stay. The hotel is steps from the beach and has a small restaurant and bar onsite. We had an oceanview room, which was average size and clean,although it could use some updating. Mini-fridge in the room nice to have with kids. The common areas of the hotel-lobby, bathrooms, restaurant, all appear fairly clean, and staff was frequently seen cleaning up. The staff was friendly and helpful with any requests. Pool towels can be signed out at the front desk which was nice. The pool was large, there are plenty of chairs and tables, upbeat music playing in the pool area. There is also a 1 foot deep kiddy pool for the little ones. Issues we had: Elevators!!!! - The hotel has only 1 set of elevators, so there is often a long wait for an elevator, on check out day we waited probably a half hour to get downstairs (had to let several elevators pass because they were full) The elevator capacity is 8, but because they take so long, many people fit as many as they can in one elevator. We were only on the 3rd floor, and would normally have just taken the stairs , but that is a whole different issue. SMELLS!!!!- The hallway didn't smell very good. The stairwells smelled TERRIBLE, awful, straightup smell of urine! we tried the stairs at both ends and they both smelled the same. It was so bad that my 10 year old son begged me not to make him take the stairs again. I don't know if they stairwells are just not cleaned regularly or what but it was really bad. The room itself was clean and not smelly . Pool Behavior- Several people drinking and smoking while in the pool. Several adults being inappropriate (making out, screaming obscenities) Overheard a few guys bragging about not even being hotel guests, parked on the beach and came to the pool. No hotel staff seen at the pool area , ever (other than the cleaning guy in the mid morning). Basically, adults acting like they are at an adult only resort, while right in front of kids. Best time to be at the pool with kids was early morning and late evening to avoid these people. Pool and pool area cleaning took place after the pool opened, didn't make much sense to me, minor annoyance to have to watch the kids trying to avoid the pool vacuum hose constantly but at least it was clean. Overall we had a great stay, once we learned to avoid the stairs and the drunk pool rats. If not for the hallway smell, lack of elevator I would have rated it a 4

Reviews.Title: “Worest hotel ive ever stayed at”
Reviews.Author: wech
Reviews.Content: The worest hotel i have ever stayed at. The elevators are so busy- you have to take the stairs not a problem- if you like the smell of urine. To the point you want to throw up. The rooms horrible. So out of date and every thing is ragged and broken.

Reviews.Title: “Best Resort on the Beach...We WILL be back :)”
Reviews.Author: SarahDrury
Reviews.Content: The Plaza Ocean Club Resort is by far one of the best places we have stayed at during our stay in Daytona Beach. The staff was very helpful. Ashley at the Front Desk was great and offered us an upgrade to have an ocean front room and we liked the room so much that we even booked an extra night. Room is big and has a kitchenette, great balcony and view is beautiful, Pool is great along with the bar and restraunts. Staff very friendly. This is definitely worth the deal you get and pay for and staying one night is just not enough :) We will be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: sgarrubba
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for the holiday and it was a great place. Very friendly staff and the room was very nice. Had a beautiful ocean view from our balcony. would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Review of Plaza Ocean Club, Daytona, Fl”
Reviews.Author: Doreen0427
Reviews.Content: Over all the stay was very nice. The staff was very nice and the room was clean. The only negative for this hotel is the elavators there are only 2 for the hotel so things run a little slow. I would go again.

Reviews.Title: “Had a blast!”
Reviews.Author: AngieD82
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here for the 4th and although a very busy time of the year, we had a great time and enjoyed the hotel! Everyone was nice and professional and we plan to visit again soon!

Reviews.Title: “We would stay there again”
Reviews.Author: april112294
Reviews.Content: The staff was friendly and helpful. The hotel was clean and everything you need was in walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location in Daytona!”
Reviews.Author: Terrie_Horvath
Reviews.Content: I loved staying at this hotel! The rooms were clean and the staff was perfectly friendly. The location of this hotel was perfect, it was in the middle of it all, the clubs, beach and shopping. The pool was amazing too! Loved how you can relax by the pool and watch the ocean at the same time. The only complaints I would have is the elevators in this hotel take forever and parking is not free. But other than that I am 100% satisfied with my stay here. =)

Reviews.Title: “Will stay here on our next vacation to Daytona Beach Florida”
Reviews.Author: Lightning1960
Reviews.Content: The staff was great, even when my granddaughter & I got ourselves locked out of our room on our balcony. We were lucky that we were only stuck on the balcony for 1/2 hour. The only thing that I would like to see changed is free WiFi in the lobby or at the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service!”
Reviews.Author: dtdavis66
Reviews.Content: The desk was awesome! Great attitude to helping others.

Reviews.Title: “60/40 negatives vs. positives”
Reviews.Author: Team_Funky
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the plaza ocean club for 6 nights last month. Having read many of the reviews online, I still went with the plaza because the price was right. Travelers, you do get what you pay for. First, the good: 1. The front desk staff was very friendly and accommodating. They offered to move us up to a seaside view for 10$ more a night, however that switch would not have been able to occur until the second night. We were going to, but once we had unloaded luggage and things we decided it was too much trouble. They called a taxi for our early morning departure as well. 2.The showers are very potent. 3.Walter at the lounge was way cool, and knew his way around. Gave great tips on places to hang out and eat. 4.Pool was clean. 5. Perfect location. we did not have a rental car, and did not need one, as there were plenty of restaurants and a walgreens near by as well. 6. Beds were comfortable, and did not appear to be coated with any sort of man/woman fluids. And the A/C was nice and loud/cool. The bad: 1. Housekeeping. WTF is going on with the housekeeping. Banging on the door at 8AM twice and just yelling HOUSEKEEPING HOUSEKEEPING. I seriously had to get out of bed to tell them to go away, because they didnt get the hint. heres an idea. Look at your census. OH these people are here for a week. We don't HAVE to clean these particular rooms at 8 in the morning. They can wait. At least they obeyed the do not disturb sign the rest of the trip. Really, its mostly about the housekeeping. One day, They didnt leave any toilet paper. Another, They didnt leave towels. Another, the rooms were clean, but the top blankets were left balled up on the floor. Over the last 10 years I have stayed at many different hotels on the gulf and atlantic side, and this one had the absolute worst housekeeping I've ever seen, and hotel management should be embarrassed. 2. Understaffed front desk. Only two computers, sometimes only one person available to help customers. Lines were a bit outrageous. 3. Our room had a partial roof view, and there was a diaper on the roof. 4. Bathroom was scuzzy. There was a black mold/substance on the shower curtain. So i thought about it. 20 rooms per floor. 2 dollars probably per inner curtain. 40 dollars x 11 floors, replace those nasty curtains (I've seen others complain on tripadvisor) and that's one thing to help your appearance. 5. And just a general sense of "patchwork". Lots of patches on ceiling, wall, crudely covered yet obvious. 6. And while very minor, as there was only a couple hours a day that we were chilling in the room... CRT television? in 2K11? For real? Having stayed at the plaza resort next door a couple years ago, and being that both are a part of the same company, I figured I would get slightly older accommodations due to the cheaper price, but the same very high level of service and cleanliness as their sister company. As you can see, this was not the case. In a nutshell, vacationers. If you are staying in Daytona, there are better values for your money. If you are fine with the housekeeping annoyances I've described, And find with quaint things like antique televisions and ceilings/walls that have "character", then book here. Otherwise, follow what other TripAdvisor posters have stated, and find a different hotel to stay at. The Good things I posted, are things that pretty much anyplace can get right. And the bad things should be an aberration relative to this hotel and other users experiences here, and not the norm.

Reviews.Title: “Nice but not perfect”
Reviews.Author: birthdayfun50
Reviews.Content: This hotel has a great location. It was my first time to visit Daytona Beach. The room had a great view of the beach and walking distance to lots of shops/restaurants and the pier. Unfortunately the pier was closed for renovations during our stay. The room had a microwave and refrigerator, however, both were very dirty. The rooms were clean, nothing fancy but the air conditioning worked great and we slept very well. The elevator was VERY slow. The staff was very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty View”
Reviews.Author: rdukette
Reviews.Content: Awesome view, Nice bar, should have one outside by the pool too. Super nice staff. Clean room. Slow elevator. Overall I would stay there again

Reviews.Title: “Decent Hotel with a great view”
Reviews.Author: chainboss
Reviews.Content: This is a nice older hotel right on the sand in Daytona Beach. The majority of the rooms have partial or full ocean views and strip views. My room was spacious and clean with room for vacation gear. The only issue that I had was with mechanical problems with the elevators. The hotel had mechanics working on the issues nearly immediately.

Reviews.Title: “And a good time was had by all - we will definitely be back!!!”
Reviews.Author: liltarheel
Reviews.Content: After having a horrible experience at a hotel a few doors down, we walked in to the Plaza Ocean Club hoping they had a vacancy. Lucky for us they did. The front desk girls were so pleasant and efficient and we were in our room within 20 minutes. The rooms were very clean and all of the hotel staff were so friendly. We had a wonderful time pool and beachside - this hotel was everything we needed!!! But, I will reiterate again - the staff made a huge impact on us returning. We will always check here first!

Reviews.Title: “For most part good experience”
Reviews.Author: Travelingtime1011
Reviews.Content: We just got back from the Plaza Ocean Club. We booked room thru Room Saver.com. Price was 1/2 of what we found on line. When we went to check in, they had had our reservations for the previous week. Needless to say, our credit card had been charged. The girl at the desk then applied proper credit to our stay for the correct week end, and all was good. Hotel charges $5.00 to park and then adds tax to that. So be prepared. We got there early and had to wait 3 hr. to get room. Hotel had just got done with a large conventions, so I can't complain. We got our Bathing Suits from car and went in large pool that is on beach. Also enjoyed cool drinks by pool. Again no complaints. Hotel is in middle of most sites and activites. All rooms have balcony's I asked for a room not far from elevator as I have a back issue, and they accommodated Even tough we paid a cheap rate, room overlooked pool and beach. ONLY complaint, is the long lines we had to stand in at desk. Two ladies behind desk, nice as can be, and didn't rush guests, just because 10 other people were standing there. Good & bad.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed The Stay”
Reviews.Author: JC31108
Reviews.Content: Arrived to the Plaza Ocean Club Hotel on June 16th. We were very pleased with the price of the room and the cleanliness of the hotel. We were given an oceanview room but we still had a great view of the ocean and sand. The hotel is very close to several great shopping places and restaurants. All the staff was helpful and friendly. This was our first time to Florida and we definately enjoyed our stay!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Resort/ location, but Cheesy disco music by the pool, needs to go!!”
Reviews.Author: Dreamsofriveriamaya
Reviews.Content: This resort is beautiful, & we did love the location, but it would of been 100% better, if there was no music by the pool, or at least not as loud. The music was very annoying & it was hard to relax by the pool w/ the disco blaring all day.. & all day 80's.. very annoying.. songs like " I ran so far away", & " I wear my sunglasses at night".. how about some Bob Marley, or Jimmy Buffet! Orrrr.... better yet.. let guest bring their own ipods! I'm on vacation, & I want quiet & relaxation. Other wise the Resort was renovated beautifully, & boast commfy lounge chairs, great views on the 12th floor. The service was friendly too. THe location was fun, we walked up & down to the pier, & the beach is wide & alot of fun, lots of beachside activities.

Reviews.Title: “LOVE THIS PLACE!!!”
Reviews.Author: mollymop12
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here in September of 2010 and was so pleased with everything we brought our family back! There were 9 of us total, 3 under the age of 7. The staff is extremely friendly and very helpful. I sometimes think they knew what we needed before we asked! The rooms were great and they even had us in joining rooms which was awesome with my nephews! The close proximity to the beach, shops and boardwalk is also a plus. I would (and plan on) staying at the Plaza Ocean Club in the future and will HIGHLY reccommend it to others!

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean accomodations right on the beach!”
Reviews.Author: Wandergirl76
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perfectly located for both the beach and Daytona shopping, dining and attractions. The hotel was clean and staff was friendly and accommodating. Would definitely stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Great staff”
Reviews.Author: WayneGillard
Reviews.Content: Wonderful location, excellent front office staff. Cheerful and welcoming. I love walking right out the door and feeling sand between my toes. We would definitely stay they again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great View, Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: We_Love_Disney
Reviews.Content: We spent two nights and really enjoyed our stay. The room was larger than average, plenty of space to move around. The room itself was quite clean, the bathroom could have used a little updating as it was not as fresh looking as other hotels I usually stay in. We were having an issue with our safe not working and someone came up to replace batteries in a very timely manner. However, we had to call twice about getting towels because housekeeping only left three in our room when we had four people. The first call went without a response, after the second towels were sent up right away. The lobby and common areas of the hotel are very nice, however the elevator system is extremely slow. Also I've read some reviews about parking being an issue but we were able to park our car in an adjacent lot only a VERY short walk to the side entrance of the hotel. In fact we could see it from our blacony. Overall we had a great experience, I wouldn't hesitate to go back!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Vacating2011
Reviews.Content: The hotel was great. The front staff and bar staffwas friendly and helpful! The lunch food was WONDERFUL. Breakfast was awful, service was slow, and food was not good. (thought that was weird because lunch was so yummy) Drinks at the bar and tiki bar are great lots of choices! Room was clean. Bed was nice. Elevators are SLOOOOOOOOW so don't be in rush! Holiday weekend was great had a DJ and a BBQ pool side fun times. All and all i would give this place a two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: “***WARNING***COCKROACHES INFESTED!!!”
Reviews.Author: mrgold1200
Reviews.Content: For my 30th birthday me and my girlfriend decide to stay at this hotel on Daytona Beach. HUGE MISTAKE! First let me say the lobby smells bad theres only one elevator which is always packed to the max. So we get to are room and the first thing we notice how dirty and nasty the carpet and floors are and how the carpet is peeling up in certain areas and damage to walls and flooring. 2 am my girlfriend wakes me up and points to a roach on the ceiling above the bed so I kill it and then a larger roach crawls up the wall followed by a smaller one, kill them show them to front desk, she doesn't offer an apology or a room change. SIMPLY PUT WORST HOTEL STAY OF MY LIFE!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: daisy1990
Reviews.Content: This was one of the worse hotels we have ever stayed at. The service at the desk is so slow, the room are old and out dated. We had to listen to a very loud AC go on and off all night. They have a restaurant but you can't get any food. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND TO ANYONE!

Reviews.Title: “well needed rest and relaxation”
Reviews.Author: dawnvarvaro
Reviews.Content: freindly staff and clean rooms give yourself extra time by pool very nice and clean pool area bar and resturant staff extremly help full and professional

Reviews.Title: “Had a great stay!”
Reviews.Author: nurselissa
Reviews.Content: We live a little south of Orlando and booked our room at 1pm for a last minute getaway that night. We booked through an online site where you don't know the name till you pay, we got a GREAT deal! I didn't expect they would give us such a nice room, I didn't expect a decent view at all, but I was wrong. We got a room on the 8th floor with a wonderful view! The balcony was a good size, my whole family could fit out there at once (me, dh, 3 kids). The hotel was literally just a few steps from the ocean. The pool was large and the kids loved it. The rooms where rather spacious too, we where only staying the night but a family would be comfortable there for a week. I highly suggest this hotel to everyone!

Reviews.Title: “Really calm, Nice place”
Reviews.Author: Theworldisastage27
Reviews.Content: I like staying in room 101, that way I can walk right on to the pool deck. Nice tv's, nice staff, Nice beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Staff, And RATES!!!”
Reviews.Author: callkee
Reviews.Content: We have been going to Daytona for 25 years. We would search the internet for the best deals we could find. We findly found it. Got a awsome Vet rate. Would defenitly recommend this hotel to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Oceanside Fun”
Reviews.Author: BeachBumGolfer
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel, but not a 3 as rated on Priceline.com. Staff went out of their way to be helpful and nice. Lobby was very nice, but elevators and rooms subpar. Nice to have a kitchen--microwave, refrig, coffeemaker. No coffee! No dishes or utensils! But had oceanview room for such a great price!! This could be a fantastic hotel if they could put a little money in it to upgrade it. Had a great time at the beach, though! would stay there again. Did cost $5 a day for parking, but I think it is becoming par for the course for Daytona Beach!

Reviews.Title: “Used to be a nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: porkchp
Reviews.Content: This place has seen better days. The elevators were working on and off and were being repaired when we were there. The place is really showing a lack of maintenance overall, doors dont close tightly and during our three nights we had maid service once. Beds were so hard and poorly put together that i slept on the floor. Pool was cloudy and felt dirty, it aint heated either. They slip papers under the door each day offering a free gift but it is really an offer to go to a time share demo. Parking is 5 bucks a day just because every place in daytona thinks they should. I dont understand why they are so petty about parking. Find somewhere else and save a few bucks. You can stay on the beach for 50 bucks at a lot of other places.

Reviews.Title: “This is the poorest maintained hotel I have stayed in ever.”
Reviews.Author: maryc922
Reviews.Content: This hotel needs a major cleaning and update. The hallway carpets are very dirty and spotted with I don't know what. I felt sorry for the group of teenagers that were sitting in the hallway eating. My room had only one closet door of what should have been by-passing mirrored doors and the track was completely rusted as was the towel rack in the bathroom. Everything in the room felt damp/wet including the carpet. When I got in the shower in the morning, my feet were so dirty from walking on the carpet it made mud in the bottom of the tub. Only one of the two elevators was working when we arrived. This was supposed to be a four day stay in Daytona. This hotel changed that very quickly. This is not a hotel I would ever stay in again nor recommend to anyone else.

Reviews.Title: “OK but not what I expected/ Great ocean view!”
Reviews.Author: Mamie7950
Reviews.Content: Sent here to stay from 4 STAR Getaways (make sure you know what your getting). I really expected 4-5 star hotel since we just left a super nice condo in Orlando. It was a Wednesday, hardly anyone anywhere, yet check in took an hour, you do have to pay for parking- that was new to me . I can't blame the employee- she was alone and having to answer the phone while checking people in (all 3 of us). We were on the 7th floor, totally awesome view to admire from the plastic chairs and small plastic table that probably cost $15 for the whole set...I'm not a snob and if I were 21 and on spring break, it would have been fine. Our toilet was broken (wouldn't flush) but someone came right up and fixed it. The room was rather small, so was the bathroom, and had an old smell (as did the whole hotel), the AC worked but was really loud so you had to turn the TV up everytime it came on. I have to say the employees were all friendly and responded quickly, but you can only work with what you have. All in all we didn't come to spend time in the Hotel, so the trip was fine...just wish it was a nicer, larger room.

Reviews.Title: “We had a great experience”
Reviews.Author: Ekimaseret
Reviews.Content: Although the desk clerk was not exactly the friendliest she was courteous and professional. The room was clean and smelled fresh. The a/c was really nice. The pool was heated and clean and towels were provided. A comp continental breakfast would have been a nice touch. The restaurant was a bit overpriced and the wait staff wasn't exactly on the ball. Despite that we had an excellent experience and would stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Never again...”
Reviews.Author: kclark50
Reviews.Content: I went down to daytona to stay with friends and have fun on spring break. When I googled the hotel, I was under the impression it was nice, clean, and very classy looking. You should know that there are 2 sides to this hotel, and they only advertise the nicer side. The side I stayed in, Ocean Plaza Club, was dirty, smelled bad, gum on the floor (even in my room, the maid didnt do a very good job of cleaning and there was gum ON MY BED!) the employees were rude, (you could tell they hated thier jobs, and hated the guests at the hotel) The "breakfast buffet" was nasty, over priced, ugh. THEN, on top of all that, I was charged an extra 200 dollars after my stay, and have never gotten a call back as to why, I would strongly suggest never staying here....

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay on Spring Break!”
Reviews.Author: kob1989
Reviews.Content: Myself and three friends spent 6 nights at the Plaza Ocean Club! Despite an hour long wait to check in (however we did check in prime time and we didn't mind waiting), this was one of the best vacations the four of us have ever gone on. The room was in great condition and then cleaning service did a great job in accommodating us everyday. The atmosphere was a great Spring Break experience and the staff and everyone at the hotel made our stay a great one!

Reviews.Title: “Unaccessible balcony, gum on floor, fridge door broken, unnecessary documentation”
Reviews.Author: Helenlee89
Reviews.Content: Luckily I only had to stay one night but it really sucked. I paid extra for a "full kitchen" when I found just a microwave and a broken fridge. The balcony has a view to the ocean with seats but you can't even access for "our protection"- when we got our room key we had to agree that we would not open the balcony door or we would get evicted immediately. Felt like I was signing my contract to a dorm room, we had to check off the condition of everything in the room including wall hole size to ceiling to blow dryers. They also attached an article of a kid who jumped off the balcony - what a great way to welcome your guests. The walls are paper thin and I was able to hear conversations from the other room. They open balconies for only people over the age of 25. Really crappy hotel and I would never recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Florida”
Reviews.Author: Suzanne34172
Reviews.Content: I am so impressed with the Plaza Ocean Club Hotel in Daytona Beach Florida. We have been coming to this hotel twice a year for Bike Week and Biketoberfest for many years. It's much like walking into your family's home. You are greeted by name and the staff for the most part is still in place. The services provided are outstanding. If you have any questions or concerns they are attended to immediately. The hotel is on the ocean and the view is wonderful. The room we get faces the ocean, so every morning we can sit and watch the sunrise if we choose on our balcony. The morning buffet is delicious and always fresh. The servers are there to tend to your every need. The front desk staff is totally outstanding and will do what ever is needed to make your trip the best ever. We have already booked for our next two trips down here because we wouldn't stay anywhere else. Don't plan on makiny any changes in the future. Happy at the home away from home. Thanks to the great team, we'll be back again and again.

Reviews.Title: “Disaster in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: newhorizonsMontreal
Reviews.Content: After a late arrival from the airport, we were greeted by cockroaches and a dog barking in the next room. We were moved to a different room which had dingy carpeting, peeling moldy walls in the bathroom, rusty bathtub, old worn sheets and towels and pigeon droppings covered the balcony. There was the smell of cigarette smoke everywhere. There were water problems each day - broken pipes. The hotel staff did their best to deal with these problems, but the building is in very bad shape. This hotel needs a major renovation.

HotelInfo.Name: Plaza Ocean Club Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 640 North Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
